content: VANCOUVER Teck Resources Ltd  has held talks with Dominic Barton  the global managing partner of consulting firm McKinsey & Co  about becoming the Canadian miner's next chairman  replacing Norman Keevil  two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.

title: Exclusive: Miner Teck taps McKinsey boss Barton for chairman role - sources

title: Teck Resources says does not expect snow melt to materially affect copper mine

content: VANCOUVER  May 8 Teck Resources Ltd is still mining some parts of the Lornex and Valley pits of its Highland Valley Copper operation in Western Canada after water inflow resulted in a suspension of some work in those areas  it said on Monday.
name: Teck Resources Ltd
title: Teck continues to mine parts of waterlogged Highland Valley pits

content: May 12 Canadian utility Fortis Inc said on Friday it would will buy Teck Resources Ltd's two-thirds stake in the Waneta dam in British Columbia as well as any related transmission assets for C$1.2 billion ($875 million) in cash.
